title: Everglades National Park: Contact Public Affairs
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     Contact Public Affairs              Contact Public Affairs      General Park Information - Please call 305-242-7700 Inquiries from media representatives should contact the park's Public Information Officer Everglades National Park 40001 State Road 9336 Homestead, FL  33034 Phone: 305-242-7714 Fax: 305-242-7711 E-mail the Public Information Officer  Â    For special or commercial use permit information contact the park's Special Park Use Coordinator Everglades National Park 40001 State Road 9336 Homestead, FL 33034 Phone: 305-242-7744 Fax: 305-242-7716 E-mail the Special Park Use Coordinator FOR GENERAL PARK INFORMATION Contact the Main Information Number at 305-242-7700
